data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Trichoura Londt, 1994 with the description of a new species from the Northern Cape Province of South Africa and a key to world Willistonininae (Diptera, Asilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Londt, Jason G. H., Dikow, Torsten (2016): A review of the genus Trichoura Londt, 1994 with the description of a new species from the Northern Cape Province of South Africa and a key to world Willistonininae (Diptera, Asilidae). African Invertebrates 57 (2): 119-135, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.57.10772, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.57.10772
